1. Sagat can whiff punish from near full-screen with his charged Tiger Uppercut in Street Fighter 6  EventHubs
  2. Juggling 5 Tiger Shots into Tiger Cannon, doing 75% of Akuma's HP in one combo and more - Desk's Sagat video pulls out all the stops  EventHubs
  3. Emperor Sagat has Returned, Year 3 Ultimate Pass For Street Fighter 6 is Now Live!  Cinelinx

item.title: Microsoft’s plan to fix the web with AI has already hit an embarrassing security flaw - The Verge
item.description:
1. Microsoft’s plan to fix the web with AI has already hit an embarrassing security flaw  The Verge
  2. Microsoft’s agentic HTML can leak passwords and AI keys, researcher finds  PCWorld
  3. A vulnerability has been found in Microsoft's project to rethink the Internet  Mezha.Media
  4. Researcher exposes Microsoft's flawed code that lets attackers access files on your computer  Neowin
  5. Microsoft’s ‘Agentic Web’ Ambition Hit by Embarrassing Security Flaw  WinBuzzer
